ProjectDescr.Title: Draft Genome Sequence of Sporoactobacillus inulinus NBRC 111894
ProjectDescr.Description: Sporoactobacillus inulinus NBRC 111894 was found and isolated from kÃ´so, a Japanese sugar-vegetable fermented beverage. Whole-genome sequencing ofSporoactobacillus inulinus NBRC 111894 was performed using an Ion Torrent PGM system. The resulting draft genome sequence is 3,074,661 bp with an average G+C content of 45.3%, and 118 contigs are assembled with a N50 length value of 59,839 bp. The draft genome of Sporoactobacillus inulinus NBRC 111894, annotated by the RAST server using Glimmer3, contains 4720 candidate open reading frames, 4 rRNA genes, and 60 tRNA genes.

Organization.Name: National University Corporation Kitami Institute of Technology
